description:
Private cozy studio apartment near Columbus Circle, Alvin Ailey, Hell's Kitchen, Times Square, Central Park and to all public transportation.

- Wi-fi and cable TV 
- 3rd floor walkup
- No Doorman
- Furnished
- Close to 1, 2, A, B, C and D trains.
- International cuisine nearby
- Real New York City experience!
name: COZY Studio Apartment near Columbus Circle
review: A great place for solo travelers on a budget. Milton's place is located a few minutes' walk from the subway, and he was very responsive during our entire trip.
